Can someone help me with configuring heritrix 2.0.2 in Eclipse? I read this=
: https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Setting+up+the+new+Heri=
trix+in+Eclipse and even tried to read this: http://www.codeweblog.com/to-b=
uild-heritrix-in-eclipse/ 
but I still can't cope with it. 
I built the src=
 project with maven, I set the M2_REPO variable and am trying to build the =
project in eclipse. I get hundreds of errors like:

_authority cannot be re=
solved	LaxURI.java	/heritrix-src/project/commons/src/main/java/org/archive/=
net	line 187	
_host cannot be resolved or is not a field	UURI.java	/heritri=
x-src/project/commons/src/main/java/org/archive/net	line 305
ARecord cannot=
 be resolved to a type	FetchDNS.java	/heritrix-src/project/modules/src/main=
/java/org/archive/modules/fetcher	line 340
...

as if the project couldn't =
see the libraries.

should I add something more to the build path? should I=
 set any other configurations? do I need the other heritrix source in eclip=
se (the built one)?

I would be really grateful for a step-by-step for tuto=
rial for idiots... 
 

Regards,
Ewa
